description:
Become a vigilant guardian of hygiene in Restaurant Health Inspection Simulator! As a dedicated health inspector, you'll embark on a weekly mission to ensure restaurants meet rigorous sanitary standards.
 
Key Features: 

 - Inspect diverse restaurants: Explore four regions, each with unique culinary experiences, as you progress through your career. 
 - Uncover violations: Utilize an arsenal of inspection tools to meticulously examine food, equipment, and hygiene practices, uncovering potential health hazards. 
 - Craft comprehensive reports: Document your findings with photos and detailed reports. 
 - Face ethical dilemmas: Navigate the pressure of potential bribes while upholding your integrity and commitment to public safety. 
 - Build your reputation: Earn the respect of your superiors and colleagues as you consistently deliver thorough and ethical inspections. 
 - Upgrade your skills: Invest your salary in acquiring new apartments, boosting your energy reserves for longer inspections. 

Are you ready to safeguard public health and ensure everyone enjoys a safe and delicious dining experience? Take on the challenge in Restaurant Health Inspection Simulator: Sanitary Service!
name: Restaurant Health Inspection Simulator: Sanitary Service
